name: Bubble Chamber
description:
An ambient dream-like magnetic world. The game elements are driven by physical forces that control their movement. An experience of wandering, exploration, and strategy.

The objective of the game is to grow your "tail" by colliding with the blue particles while avoiding the red particles created when a group of blue particles is combined.

++++

Designers: Talia Hamburg, Ruthie Yarmolinsky

Developers: Yam Fine, Matan Shomer

Game Jam class, Bezalel 2021.

++++

This game operates on your nearest computer.

It is best experienced turning all the lights off.

++++

Control: Arrow keys, WASD keys
